Uses of Interface
us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame.interfaces.FrameOrientation2DReadOnly

  • Packages that use FrameOrientation2DReadOnly 
    Package Description
    us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame  
    us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame.interfaces  

    • Uses of FrameOrientation2DReadOnly in us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame

      Classes in us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame that implement FrameOrientation2DReadOnly 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  FrameOrientation2D
      A FrameOrientation2D represents an orientation in the XY-plane expressed in a given reference frame.
      Constructors in us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame with parameters of type FrameOrientation2DReadOnly 
      Constructor Description
      FrameOrientation2D​(FrameOrientation2DReadOnly other)
      Creates a new frame orientation 2D and initializes it to other.
      FramePose2D​(FrameTuple2DReadOnly position, FrameOrientation2DReadOnly orientation)
      Creates a new pose 2D initialize it from the given position and orientation.

    • Uses of FrameOrientation2DReadOnly in us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame.interfaces

      Subinterfaces of FrameOrientation2DReadOnly in us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame.interfaces 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  FixedFrameOrientation2DBasics
      Write and read interface for a 2D orientation that is expressed in a immutable reference frame.
      interface  FrameOrientation2DBasics
      Write and read interface for a 2D orientation that is expressed in a mutable reference frame.
      Methods in us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame.interfaces that return FrameOrientation2DReadOnly 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      FrameOrientation2DReadOnly FramePose2DReadOnly.getOrientation()
      Gets the read-only reference of the orientation part of this pose 2D.

      distance = this.yaw - other.yaw
      default double FrameOrientation2DReadOnly.distance​(FrameOrientation2DReadOnly other)
      Computes the distance between this and other as the absolute difference in angle:
      distance = Math.abs(this.yaw - other.yaw)
